text: Go's json.MarshalIndent escapes < > & to Unicode (\u003c etc.) by default for HTML safety. To preserve literal characters in prompts/templates, use json.Encoder with SetEscapeHTML(false). Created pkg/jsonutil for this.
When using huh forms inside Bubble Tea TUI, use tea.Exec to properly suspend the TUI during form execution. Running forms in goroutines causes stdin conflicts ("resource temporarily unavailable").

Claude Code commands use markdown files with YAML frontmatter. Supported fields: description, argument-hint, model (opus/sonnet/haiku), allowed-tools, disallowed-tools. agentctl's sync adapter translates between JSON and this format.
